participant_1.name: Ava
participant_1.personality: Creative, determined, and friendly. Passionate about art and enjoys being active.
participant_1.background: I have no siblings, but I have many friends who are like my family. My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it. I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears. I take pride in getting straight A's. I eat a strictly vegan diet.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Hardworking, practical, and resourceful. Enjoys hands-on projects and has a good sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house. My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet. I like the movie Godfather. My favorite band is VV Nation. I always wear something purple.

content.text: Hey! I just spent my birthday building a new deck on my house.
Nice! I spent my last birthday working on a house I was building.
Oh wow. You are a builder?
Yes I am! I build houses for people who need them.
That's so cool! I just build decks, but I hope to build houses one day.
You should! It's a great career, and it's very rewarding.
I would love to! I'm just not sure how to get started.
There are a lot of great resources online that can help you get started. And there are also a lot of great books that can teach you everything you need to know.
Thanks for the advice! I'll definitely check it out.
No problem! If you have any questions, feel free to ask me.
No problem! Have a great day!
